column5: SO as I was at the music shop last night I heard that Dio Iommi Ward and Butler would team up once again and hit the road dont know how many of you out there had the opp. to see this show in the early 80,s but it was absolutly fantastic although they are alot older now i can tell you from seeing them as Black Sabbath with Ozzy as musicians theyu have not diminished at all  I would recomend this show to any Metal head ar wanna be Metalhead this is old scool and definatley worth the price of admission. I believe this show with the opening line up will tear a hole in your head  Peter
I dont recognize any of those fishermen.
Biteme, did you see the Varadero report?  Check it out, when are you going? Tony
I saw the Heaven and Hell tour in Detroit back in the 80's. Great show, a must for any fan. HH

Hey Biteme, have you heard any of Geezer Butler's latest albums....pretty intense speed metal to say the least.   Saw Sabbath w/Dio as well. Ten Years After were the opening act when they played Ottawa in the 80's.
that will be a heavy duty show...   im sure those guys still will tear the roof of the ACC.....ALL THE YOUNG PEOPLE DONT EVEN KNOW WHO THESE GUYS ARE
